channel.title: devops on GrooveStomp
channel.description: Recent content in devops on GrooveStomp

item.title: Chef Dependency Management
item.description: At work we’ve been using Chef to manage systems automation. It’s been a bit of a rough process with only one devops team member. Around five months ago I started pitching in. This served two purposes: test our existing process and help out with more pressing automation tasks. It became quite obvious that our use of Chef required a lot more discipline and structure. We’re not fully there yet, but we’re definitely making improvements.
